title.rendered: The 6-Figure Earner’s Guide to Branding with Dmitriy Kozlov

content.rendered:
Living a life centered on your true purpose…

Doing meaningful work that constantly challenges you to give your deepest gifts…

All while living out your purest passion and doing it all with an authentic self-expression…

Those are the call to arms of Jules Schroeder.

Jules created Unconventional Life, a top-ranked podcast for entrepreneurs that features the stories of millennials living from a new paradigm.

Jules has been ranked by Inc. Magazine as #1 of the “Top 27 Female Entrepreneurs Changing the World in 2017” and one of the “Top 40 Millennials To Follow in 2018″.  She’s a musician and visionary on a mission to inspire people to create an intentional and rich life, a life by their own design.  

Unconventional Life has reached millions of people from over 75 different countries and has become a global community of like-minded entrepreneurs, influencers, creatives, and thought leaders. Jules herself has always been multi-passionate as an avid crossfitter, yoga teacher, musician and singer, writer, traveler and overall life enthusiast.

We’re thrilled to announce that recently, Jules interviewed our very own resident visionary at Influex, Dima Kozlov.

Check out her video podcast here as she and Dima explore the do’s and don’ts of personal branding.

Of course, helping her to expand her reach and to get more and more people to hear her message was a mission we were too glad to accept! When the opportunity to support Jules’ mission and work with her to re-strategize her new Influencer brand site came up, we jumped right in!

Check out Jules’ awesome new Influex site here: https://www.julesschroeder.com/
